forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of fog early, becoming sunny this afternoon. High 16C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Foggy early, becoming sunny this afternoon. High 61F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 18C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High around 65F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 47F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 17C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 64F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 54F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High near 60F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 12C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low around 55F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with thundershowers following a period of rain early. High 14C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy. A steady rain early with showers and perhaps a rumble of thunder developing in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 12C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 54F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. High around 15C. Winds S at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain likely. High near 60F. Winds S at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with periods of rain. Low 12C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with rain. Low near 55F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 14C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 58F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 11C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 53F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. High 58F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 11C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 52F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of light rain. High 14C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 11C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 53F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers in the morning, becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the morning, becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Low 11C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low 53F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
